success.saved: 選択がセーブしました

info.reset:
全てのオプションが省略時値でリセットしました。
今変化を「確認」抓みでクリックするとセーブは可能するかページを閉じるで変化を破棄するかこの通知を捨て置くするは可能です。

error.validation:
設定がインポートを失敗されました。ファイル形式を確認してください。
{{ERROR_MESSAGE}}
error.unknown:
設定がインポートを失敗されました。ファイル形式を確認してください。
未知数なエラーが起こった。

exportButton.success: 設定がエクスポートをされました

rememberLastVolume.title: Remembers the volume of the last video you were watching and sets it when you open a new video
rememberLastVolume.label: Remember last volume

maximizePlayerButton.title: 動画をウィンドウ・サイズまで広がるする
maximizePlayerButton.label: Enable maximize player button

videoHistory.title: Keeps track of where you left off on videos you were watching and asks if you want to resume when that video loads again
videoHistory.label: Enable video history

remainingTime.title: Shows the remaining time of the video you're watching
remainingTime.label: Enable remaining time

loopButton.title: Adds a button to the player to loop the video you're watching
loopButton.label: Enable loop button

automaticTheaterMode.title: Automatically enables theater mode when you load a video
automaticTheaterMode.label: Enable automatic theater mode

enable.title: Lets you use the scroll wheel to control the volume of the video you're watching
enable.label: Enable scroll wheel volume control

osdColor.title: Select the color for the On-Screen Display
osdColor.label: OSD Color

osdType.title: Select the style of On-Screen Display
osdType.label: OSD Type

osdPosition.title: Select the position of the On-Screen Display
osdPosition.label: OSD Position

osdOpacity.title: Adjust the transparency of the On-Screen Display
osdOpacity.label: OSD Opacity

osdVolumeAdjustmentSteps.title: Adjust the volume change per scroll
osdVolumeAdjustmentSteps.label: Volume Change Per Scroll

osdHide.title: Specify the time, in milliseconds, before automatically hiding the OSD
osdHide.label: Hide Delay

osdPadding.title: Adjust the spacing around the on-screen display (OSD) in pixels. This applies specifically to corner OSD.
osdPadding.label: Padding

enable.title: Press a modifier key to enable volume adjustment with the scroll wheel.
enable.label: Enable hold modifier key

enable.title: Hold right click to enable scroll wheel volume control
enable.label: Enable hold right click

enable.title: Automatically adjusts the video quality to the selected level.
enable.label: Enable automatic quality adjustment

select.label: Player quality
select.title: The quality to set the video to

enable.title: Sets the video speed to what you choose below
enable.label: Enable forced playback speed

select.label: Player speed
select.title: The speed to set the video to

enable.title: Boosts the volume of the video you're watching
enable.label: Enable volume boost

number.label: Volume boost amount (dB)
number.title: The amount to boost the volume by

enable.title: Adds a button to the player to take a screenshot of the video
enable.label: Enable screenshot button

selectFormat.label: Screenshot format
selectFormat.title: The format to save the screenshot in

clear.title: Clears all data this extension has stored on your machine

reset.title: Resets all settings to their defaults, Click the confirm button to save the changes

select.label: 言語
select.title: エクステンションに使用する言語

clearData.confirmAlert: This will delete all extension data related to options. Continue?
